name: Don't Watch the Moon (Complete)
description:
This is the first release of my recently completed game, Don't Watch the Moon.  I have worked hard on it for the last few months , so hopefully you enjoy! This is an Indie horror story game where you play as a boy named Eli who is trying to find his way home after mysteriously awakening in a forest. Any comments with bug finds, criticism, or what you think are very valuable to me, so feel free to say something!

Controls:

Dialogue/Interact (Space)

Walk (A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow)

Jump (W or Up Arrow)

Crouch (S or Down Arrow  or Left Shift)

Credit:

Music: Clair de Lune- Claude Debussy
